trigger.description: {HOSTNAME} : Number of documents has increased beyond previous high waternark

{HOSTNAME} : One or more timeouts occurred during replication
{HOSTNAME} : One or more errors occurred during document searches

{HOSTNAME} : Average update activity has been high for the past 1 hour (avg is 50% more as compared to the last 4 hours)
{HOSTNAME} : One or more timeouts occurred during document updates
